text.content:
**This dashboard monitors the real-time API health and usage for the Gemini CLI.**

#### Metric Definitions
* **[A] Success vs Error Rate:** Tracks the percentage of successful API calls compared to failures over time. A high error bar indicates immediate service disruption.
* **[B] Response Code Distribution:** A volumetric breakdown of traffic by outcome:\
ðŸŸ¢ **2xx (Successful):** Request processed successfully.\
ðŸ”´ **4xx (Client Error):** Request errored out due to client-side issue.\
ðŸŸ  **5xx (Server Error):** Request failed due to an issue on the server's end.

timeSeriesQuery.prometheusQuery:
label_replace(
  100 * (
    sum(increase({"__name__"="logging.googleapis.com/user/gemini_cli_success","monitored_resource"="global"}[${__interval}]))
    /
    (
      (sum(increase({"__name__"="logging.googleapis.com/user/gemini_cli_success","monitored_resource"="global"}[${__interval}]))  or on() vector(0))
      +
      (sum(increase({"__name__"="logging.googleapis.com/user/gemini_cli_error","monitored_resource"="global"}[${__interval}]))  or on() vector(0))
    )
  ),
  "result_type", "success", "", ""
)

label_replace(
  100 * (
    sum(increase({"__name__"="logging.googleapis.com/user/gemini_cli_error","monitored_resource"="global"}[${__interval}])) 
    /
    (
     ( sum(increase({"__name__"="logging.googleapis.com/user/gemini_cli_success","monitored_resource"="global"}[${__interval}]))  or on() vector(0))
      +
      (sum(increase({"__name__"="logging.googleapis.com/user/gemini_cli_error","monitored_resource"="global"}[${__interval}]))  or on() vector(0))
    )
  ) ,
  "result_type", "error", "", ""
)
